DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial help determine prebiotics increase mineral absorption baby
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Mineral Absorption Infants Fed Infant Formula
DOC.criteria: Singleton Term infant Birth weight 2500 g 5670 day age Signed informed consent Consuming cow 's milkbased infant formula least 24 hour . History underlying disease congenital malformation , opinion Investigator , likely interfere normal growth development evaluation mineral absorption participant Use multiple vitamin mineral supplement prior enrollment . Evidence formula intolerance poor intake time randomization
